column1: Baby Barnaby's////A search through Yelp for breakfast spots unearthed this little gem -- Baby Barnaby's. It takes a lot to get me out of bed before noon on the weekends
column2: but the promise of Barnaby's incredible "green eggs" is usually enough to get me moving. This little eatery serves up great breakfast plates. Or at least
column3: that's what I assume judging from what I see everyone else noshing on. I myself only rarely stray from the heavenly green eggs plate
column4: which is a scramble with artichoke hearts
column6: and cheese. It's light and decadent
column7: a perfect accompaniment to the slice of wheat toast that comes with it. The chicken sausages I can do without
column8: but my boyfriend never seems to mind wolfing them down when I push them off to the side.
